WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
NEW YORK.
DNC 17.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM 86 FOOT
F/V APOLLO IN 39-43.5N 072-40.4W AT 1519740Z DEC.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC BOSTON,
PHONE: 617 223 8555,
E-MAIL: RCCBOSTON@USCG.MIL.
